1370: Emgelberna moved to Papenhofstede.A.2 after marriage.
Got married to Winrechus at age 17 in 1370.
Gave birth to Ever in 1370 at age 17.
1371: Lost daughter Kerstine when Kerstine was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Kerstine in 1371 at age 18.
1372: Gave birth to Menoldis in 1372 at age 19.
1375: Gave birth to Hille in 1375 at age 22.
1377: Lost daughter Menoldis when Menoldis was 6 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Verthwi in 1378 at age 25.
1379: Gave birth to Diewiven in 1379 at age 26.
Lost son Ever when Ever was 10 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1380: Gave birth to Pauels in 1380 at age 27.
1383: Lost daughter Diewiven when Diewiven was 5 years old.
1384: Gave birth to Hodine in 1384 at age 31.
Lost daughter Hodine when Hodine was 1 years old.
1389: Gave birth to Ghisebrecht in 1389 at age 36.
Lost son Pauels when Pauels was 10 years old.
1392: Gave birth to Ivone in 1392 at age 39.
1397: Lost son Ivone when Ivone was 6 years old.
